issue.title: [Python] Remove superfluous skipped timedelta test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6885](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6885). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we support timedelta / duration type, there is an old xfailed test that can be removed.

comments.body:
